title: Issue when starting LoL if Browser Opera is open
body:
I noticed the Issue i cant start the secound Client (Login&Pwd) if i have my current Opera Browser open. Is that a major Problem?
Is there a way to fix it?

replies.body: That's pretty strange! Do you have any proxies or anything similar configured for Opera? Anything you could think of such as add-ons that could conflict with League?
